1.0.0.name: wordpress/donation
1.0.0.description:
A simple but effective plugin to allow blog visitors to make donations to the author. Payments are collected via PayPal and validated before the donor's message of thanks is displayed on a blog page.

Features:

  • Integrates with PayPal
  • Displays a public list of donors and their messages
  • Allows admin to hide/mark unpaid donations in the admin panel
  • Unsuccessful donation attempts are visible to admin in the admin panel
  • Light and extensible, an ideal developers building block
